Explore The NTT

Next Think Tank is a platform which brings multiple speakers under one roof to contribute their stories to one theme-“3Cs-Choices, Chances and Changes. It is a Professional Development Initiative by Rotaract District 3142 that has been brought to life by thousands of Rotaractors all over the District by bringing speakers from multi-discplinary sectors of lives, stories and much more.

Learn More

CAUSE OF THIS EVENT

Fund underprivileged children who can’t afford
education. Underprivileged children also often don’t have access to quality education, shelter, healthy food, and medical care. This makes them vulnerable to malnutrition, diseases, and exploitation. So let’s help them by donating some small amount because some of your help can make thir life change.

CONTRIBUTE

MARK THE DATE

19th March,2022
